name: rapworldmap
description: Display a map of Rapper based on their childhood neighborhood

scripts.dev:css: nodemon -e scss -x "npm run compile:css && npm run autoprefixer"
scripts.dev:js: watchify -t [ babelify ] app/assets/js/atlas.js -o public/js/atlas.bundle.js | watchify -t [ babelify ] app/assets/js/admin.js -o public/js/admin.bundle.js
scripts.browserify: NODE_ENV=production browserify app/assets/js/atlas.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -o public/js/atlas.bundle.js | NODE_ENV=production browserify app/assets/js/admin.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -o public/js/admin.bundle.js
scripts.uglify:js: NODE_ENV=production uglifyjs public/js/atlas.bundle.js -mc -o public/js/atlas.bundle.js | NODE_ENV=production uglifyjs public/js/admin.bundle.js -mc -o public/js/admin.bundle.js
scripts.build:css: npm run compile:css && npm run autoprefixer && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:js: npm run browserify && npm run uglify:js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:js && npm run build:css

author: Crucifix Arnaud
